lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Market analysts today said the other two firms are believed to be foreign oil companies, noting that TransCanada yesterday stressed that its bid is "a Canadian solution to the financial difficulties of Dome Petroleum."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Gobert characterized the market action in Dome today as "awfully optimistic," given TransCanada's offer to give current Dome shareholders stock in a new subsidiary, which it valued at 1.10 dlrs Canadian per common share.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: David Bryson of Moss Lawson and Co also noted that British Petroleum PLC <BP> is mentioned as a possible buyer, despite BP's 70 U.
